item.title: Private Tutoring
item.description: I offer private tuition to a small number of philosophy and logic students, on a one-to-one basis. For each student, I put together a unique package of tuition, based on their aims and needs, whether this be: Passing an upcoming exam Progressing with a university or adult-education course Developing a general interest For students looking for a general introduction to philosophy, we might cover a range of philosophical topics, at a level appropriate to your prior knowledge and skills.
